title: Study can be regarded as scientific if

content.question: A common criticism of some psychological perspectives, like the psychodynamic perspective, is that the theories supporting it are not falsifiable. Which of the following accurately describes what makes a theory falsifiable?

choices.label: Its findings are consistent with established theories.
Its conclusions are based on strong correlational data.
Its conclusions can be verified or refuted by subsequent studies.

content.answer: Its conclusions can be verified or refuted by subsequent studies.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
